Name: Computer Science
Description: Introduction to computer science concepts and programming.

Name: Mathematics
Description: Fundamental concepts of mathematics including algebra, calculus, and geometry.

Name: Physics
Description: Study of matter, energy, and the fundamental forces of nature.

Name: Biology
Description: Study of living organisms and their interactions with each other and their environments.

Name: History
Description: Study of past events and their impact on society.

Name: Chemistry
Description: Study of the composition, properties, and reactions of matter.

Name: English
Description: Study of literature, language, and writing.

Name: Art
Description: Study of visual arts, music, and performing arts.

Name: Physical Education
Description: Study of physical fitness, sports, and health.

Name: Foreign Language
Description: Study of languages other than one's native language.

Name: Economics
Description: Study of the production, distribution, and consumption of goods and services.

Name: Psychology
Description: Study of the mind and behavior.

Name: Sociology
Description: Study of human society and social behavior.

Name: Philosophy
Description: Study of fundamental questions about existence, knowledge, values, reason, mind, and language.

Name: Geography
Description: Study of the Earth's physical features and human populations
